snippet: Responding to criticism about how she defended a rape suspect in 1975, Hillary Rodham Clinton said she had asked to be removed from the case, but was not.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, responding to criticism about how she defended a rape suspect in 1975, says she fulfilled her professional duty as an attorney to represent him; says she had asked to be removed from the case, but was not.
lead_paragraph: Responding to criticism about how she defended a rape suspect in 1975, Hillary Rodham Clinton said she had asked to be removed from the case, but was not.

headline.main: Clinton Defends Her Handling of a Rape Case in 1975
headline.print_headline: Clinton Defends Her Handling of a Rape Case in 1975
